oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Bovine Neonatal Pancytopenia (BNP): Emerging Disease or Transient Tragedy?
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Friedrich, A.
Rademacher, G.
Carlin, A.
Assad, A.
Hafner-Marx, A.
Klee, W.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: bleeding disorder
neonatal calves
epidemiology
novel disease
Bovine Neonatal Pancytopenia
BNP
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Since the spring of 2007, cases of an almost always lethal bleeding disorder in neonatal calves have appeared, first in Germany and since in many other European countries with increasing incidence, with some notable exceptions. Results of epidemiological, clinical, and experimental investigations are reported.
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: American Association of Bovine Practitioners Conference Proceedings; 2010; 223
